title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings – Extension of Period of 
Effect) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering - extension period effect) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 244 of
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 244 of 
2020) are amended by the substitution of the following Regulation for 
Regulation 2: 

These Regulations shall have effect for the period beginning on 
“2. 
the date specified in Regulation 1(2) and ending on the 9th day of 
November 2021.”.
text_norm: 2 health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid19) (face covering public transport) regulation 2020 (s.i no 244 2020) amended substitution following regulation regulation 2 regulation shall effect period beginning 2 date specified regulation 1(2) ending 9th day november 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020
text_raw:
3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 296 of 2020) are amended by the substitution of the following 
Regulation for Regulation 2: 

“2. 
These Regulations shall have effect for the period beginning on 
the date specified in Regulation 1(2) and ending on the 9th day of 
November 2021.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [273] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service Vehicles and Certain Premises)
text_raw:
4. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service Vehicles and Certain Premises) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 569 of 2020) are amended, in Regulation 2, by the 
substitution of following paragraph for paragraph (2): 

“(2) These Regulations shall have effect for the period 
beginning on the date specified in paragraph (1) and ending on the 9th 
day of November 2021.”.
text_norm: 4 health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid19) (face covering small public service vehicle certain premises) regulation 2020 (s.i no 569 2020) amended regulation 2 substitution following paragraph paragraph (2) (2) regulation shall effect period beginning date specified paragraph (1) ending 9th day november 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 5. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) (No. 2) Regulations
text_raw:
5. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) (No. 2) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 571 of 2020) are amended, in Regulation 1(2), by the 
substitution of “the 9th day of November 2021” for “the 8th day of June 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 June, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [273]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 244 of 2020), the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020), the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service 
Vehicles and Certain Premises) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 569 of 2020), and 
the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face 
Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 571 of 2020) to provide that their operation is extended to 09 November
